checkLogs.title: How to check import logs
checkLogs.description: To review the import process and identify issues with field mapping, follow these steps:

steps.first: Open developer console in your browser (F12 or Ctrl+Shift+I)
steps.fourth: Analyze logs to detect issues with field mapping and data processing
steps.fifth: Logs provide detailed information about the unit import process, how fields are mapped, and any errors that may have occurred during import

form.formatHelp: The system supports field names in camelCase and Title Case formats:
form.formatHelp1: camelCase format: unit_number, floor_number, building, etc.
form.formatHelp2: Title Case format: Unit Number, Floor, Building, etc.
form.mapColumnsDescription: Map columns from your file to corresponding fields. Required fields: Unit Number, Floor, and Building.
